subject: Prayers and Prayer Books
Chaplains
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Brother Ed Sheehy, La Salle’s team chaplain for 21 seasons, offers prayers before and after games that include some pep talk, sprinkled with La Salle history and motivational quips.
snippet: Brother Ed Sheehy, La Salle’s team chaplain for 21 seasons, offers prayers before and after games that include some pep talk, sprinkled with La Salle history and motivational quips.
